Headline: Revised: #70 Division Temporary Reroute at Division/California
ShortDescription: Revised: 70 Division buses are temporarily rerouted via Division, California, Augusta, Western, and Division due to street blockage Division/California.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Revised: #70 Division buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Division, California, Augusta, Western, and Division due to street blockage at Division/California.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #86 Narragansett/Ridgeland Temporary Reroute at Ridgeland/Thomas
ShortDescription: 86 Narragansett/Ridgeland buses are temp. rerouted via Ridgeland, Chicago, Austin, North Avenue, and Narragansett due to street blockage at Ridgeland/Thomas.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#86 Narragansett/Ridgeland buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Ridgeland, Chicago, Austin, North Avenue, and Narragansett due to, street blockage at Ridgeland/Thomas.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Howard-bound Red Line trains bypassing North/Clybourn
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are running, but not stopping at North/Clybourn due to a sick customer.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are running, but not stopping at North/Clybourn due to a sick customer.

We apologize for this inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.
